Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B
BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A + B
BD Veritor System for Flu A+B
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B, a chromatographic immunoassay for detecting influenza A and B viral antigens from respiratory swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: A rapid chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens from nasopharyngeal and nasal swabs of symptomatic patients as an aid in the diagnosis of influenza A and B viral infections.
